data.comment: The match has started.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 2, Yusuke Araki signals a Kashima throw-in in Oita's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Oita.
In the minute 5, Kashima takes a corner from the right.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Oita.
Kashima are pushing forward but Shintaro Nago's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 9, Yusuke Araki awards Oita a goal kick.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Everaldo (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 16, Kashima to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Kashima pushes forward through Ikuma Sekigawa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kashima drive upfield and Everaldo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Oita defender.
In the minute 20, Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Oita.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Kashima's Ryuji Izumi misses with an attempt on goal.
Oita have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Kashima.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 28, Yuji Hoshi of Oita gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Throw-in Oita.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 33, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Yusuke Araki has awarded Kashima a corner.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Oita's area.
In the minute 42, Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Free kick Kashima.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Juan Alano (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 45, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Toshio Shimakawa is booked for the away team.
The second-half is underway at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 46, Zago is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Ryotaro Araki replacing Shintaro Nago.
Ayase Ueda is on a sub for Everaldo for Kashima.
The away team replace Daiki Watari with Yuya Takazawa.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Oita.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 48, Kashima needs to be cautious. Oita have an attacking throw-in.
Kashima drive forward but Ayase Ueda is judged offside.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 51, Yusuke Araki signals a Kashima throw-in in Oita's half.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 52, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashima.
Kashima's Juan Alano gets in a shot on goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
Kazuki Kozuka scores to make it 0-1 at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In Kashima Kashima attack through Ayase Ueda. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Oita at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Oita to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Juan Alano (Kashima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 63, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Goal kick for Oita at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Naoki Nomura is replacing Kazuki Kozuka for the away team.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a Oita throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Mun Kyung Gun (Oita) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 67, Kashima make their third substitution with Yasushi Endo replacing Shuto Yamamoto.
Oita have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Oita make their third substitution with Ryosuke Tone replacing Yuta Koide.
The away team have replaced Yushi Hasegawa with Kento Haneda. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Oita's area.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 76, Ikuma Sekigawa (Kashima) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Kashima.
Yuta Matsumura is on a sub for Ryuji Izumi for Kashima.
In the minute 78, Zago (Kashima) is making a fifth substitution, with Itsuki Someno replacing Ikuma Sekigawa.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Oita take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Yuya Takazawa.
In the minute 80, Great play from Naoki Nomura to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Oita at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Oita in the half of Kashima.
Yusuke Araki awards Kashima a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Oita.
In the minute 85, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 87, Yusuke Araki signals a Kashima throw-in in Oita's half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Oita needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ayase Ueda's header is off-target for Kashima.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Throw-in Kashima.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Itsuki Someno (Kashima) strikes at Kashima Soccer Stadium but his header is cleared.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Yamato Machida is replacing Tatsuya Tanaka for Oita at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
